casebody.data:
CROWELL
v.
CROWELL 31A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Crowell, Andrea Kirby Amy Simpson Fiorenza, Attorney at Law, for Crowell, William Worrell

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of February 2019 by Defendant to Deem Brief Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
